name: Fiction
description: Literary works invented by the imagination, such as novels or short stories.

name: Non-Fiction
description: Informative or factual books, including biographies, history, and self-help.

name: Science Fiction
description: Stories based on advanced science and technology, often set in the future.

name: Mystery
description: Books that involve solving a crime or uncovering secrets.

name: Fantasy
description: Fiction involving magical elements, imaginary worlds, and mythical creatures.

name: Romance
description: Stories focused on romantic relationships between characters.

name: Biography
description: Books that tell the life story of a real person.

name: Children's Books
description: Books written specifically for children, often with illustrations and moral lessons.
